description.displayText: Jessica stopped by to help me with laundry and was wonderful. She did a great job with the task and was very friendly.
description.originalText: Jessica stopped by to help me with laundry and was wonderful. She did a great job with the task and was very friendly.

description.displayText:
Jessica was nanny to our two year old and eight month old for close to a year. She was always punctual (sometimes even early), loving and responsible. Not only that, she's also smart and adaptable - for instance, she would be aware if the schedule needs to change based on how the children are doing and provide feedback on what classes are good for the kids (even if it's a far way to walk, if the class and teacher are good, she would be all for it). She's a second mom to the kids as she would also be on a lookout if they were treated well by others and ensure they were always safe, confident and healthy. 

She's also really fun and sociable, which allowed our kids to make a group of new friends around the neighborhood - we always joke that our kids have more friends than we do!  She'd think of fun activities with them and proactively organize playdates. She would cook and prepare all the children's meals as well. 

I felt completely at ease when I know my children are with Jessica, which is so important when both parents are working full-time. Any family would be lucky to have Jessica and we miss her dearly.

description.displayText: We'd originally hired Jessica as nanny share with another family back in March 2020, when our baby was just 3 months old. After a week, the pandemic happened... then in December, we hired Jessica again on a part-time basis (2 days a week) to care for our now toddler. From our first interactions with Jessica, we knew that she's someone who we can trust; she's highly experienced, calm, loving and someone with principals. Our toddler loves having her around; she engages her in activities, teaches her words and manners. After just a day our toddler learnt to say "agua"! (We'd asked her to speak Spanish with our toddler). If we had the capacity now to offer full-time hours to Jessica, we'd certainly do so!

description.displayText: Jessica worked for us as a full-time nanny and did an excellent job taking care of our 3-year-old child. She is incredibly professional and brings a great deal of experience to the position. We were sorry to lose her, but our circumstances changed and we didn't need a nanny any more. Any family looking for a nanny should take the opportunity to consider Jessica for the position.
